price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Birengagize maze ubarabishe amaso. Bihoze, ubarindire, ubatege umusi umuraritsi yavugije inzamba ararikira ibiremwa kuja ku kintu gihambaye koko, na co si ikindi, ni uguharurirwa ivyo vyakoze;
arabic: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡۘ يَوۡمَ يَدۡعُ ٱلدَّاعِ إِلَىٰ شَيۡءٖ نُّكُرٍ

meta.transliteration: fatawalla ʿanhum yawma yadʿu al-dāʿi ilā shayin nukurin
